sentences.en: A dozen mounted police rode into the square.
sentences.cn: 十几名骑警进入了广场。

sentences.en: Bob hurried to join him, and they rode home together.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃匆忙赶去和他会合，然后两人一起开车回家。

sentences.en: Cowboys drove covered wagons and rode horses, lassoing cattle.
sentences.cn: 牛仔们有的赶着大篷车，有的骑着马，抛套索捕牛。

sentences.en: Finding a second wind, he rode away from his pursuers.
sentences.cn: 他缓过劲儿来，骑马逃离了追赶他的人。

sentences.en: He got on his bicycle and rode off.
He mounted his horse and rode away.
He rode his son on his shoulders.
sentences.cn: 他让儿子骑在他的肩上。

sentences.en: He rode on the president's luxury train through his own state.
sentences.cn: 他乘坐总统的豪华列车经过自己所在的州。

sentences.en: He rode to work on a bicycle.
He rode uptown and made his way to Bob's apartment.
sentences.cn: 他乘车前往城外鲍勃的公寓。

sentences.en: His mother rode him on her back.
sentences.cn: 他的母亲让他骑在她的背上。

sentences.en: I left a sergeant in command and rode forward to reconnoitre.
sentences.cn: 我留下一名中士指挥，自己策马前去侦察敌情。

sentences.en: I rode bareback to the paddock.
sentences.cn: 我骑着无鞍马来到了牧场。

sentences.en: I rode to Lily's in a cab.
sentences.cn: 我乘出租车去了莉莉家。

sentences.en: She got on her bike and rode off.
She rode pillion on her son's motor bike.
sentences.cn: 她坐在儿子摩托车的后座上。

sentences.en: They rode over to see us last week.
sentences.cn: 上星期他们骑马来探望我们。

sentences.en: Three mounted officers rode into the field after the volley.
sentences.cn: 枪炮一起开火后，3名军官骑着马冲进战场。
